name: Kruzifer Delaluz
text: These guys are fantastic. They can always get what you need. Even if it isn't in stock in Mobile, they can get it in a day from the Ryerson in Birmingham, Atlanta or New Orleans. Guys in the shop are friendly and always willing to help. This is the only company I will ever buy metal from.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Kruzifer Delaluz. Hope to see you back

name: Artem Varvinets
text:
1) Get ready to stuck while getting in to their yard. Thanks Sall for pulling me out.
2) Right handed backing
3) Dont hope to get loaded fast.
1,5-2 hours.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Artem Varvinets. Hope to see you back

name: Joshua Hicks
text: Great company quick loading and unloading and awesome staff and work place highly recommended

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Joshua Hicks . Hope to see you back

name: Rebecca Spann
text: Hands down the best company to purchase metal from. A+++

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Rebecca Spann. Hope to see you back

name: Honey Bugs Apiaries
text: Great customer service, management, and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review Honey Bugs Apiaries. Hope to see you back

name: scott stewart
text: It is a GREAT place to work, DEFINITELY a place that can show you  how real life is!!!!!

name: Joseph Prosnitz
text: Ordered via ebay. They are somewhat unresponsive (slow ebay message response and their phone message machine is full). Prices seem good but items have taken longer than projected to arrive.

name: Derek Waggoner
text: Been here 2 hours still not in dock. Looks like it takes an hour per truck to unload.  You better be first in line and waiting s 0600 because if there are any trucks in front of you,  you will be here all day.  Gotta sit in the street while waiting.  A bit of dangerous situation as it is a blind curve.  Luckily it's not a busy road.  But really though?  Only one truck can fit in at a time?  Only one way in and one way out also.  Don't come from the way of the 4 way intersection.  Zoom out on the map and come from the other direction.  The entry to the "one way in" looks like it would be impossible if you don't.

name: Darrin Gordon
text: I'm the only truck here and its been over two hours trying to get unloaded. Its tricky getting to the dock, so take your time. But, I couldn't imagine if there was 5 or 6 trucks in line. You'll burn out your time waiting to get unloaded

Is Wrong address
Right one is:
VP2H+VH Ashville, Alabama

name: Moto moto
text: Great guy at the scale and loading, its alittle tight to get into spot but had a good experience with loader..👍🏽👍🏽

name: Amad Abdallatif
text: The guy scaling you and loading is great but the facility itself is rough

name: Greg Parks
text: Don’t go here it’s a joke
